entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Laurentides (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:15 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:41 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:41 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
